items.sentence: The police think Tom was stabbed before his throat was slit.
Tom didn\'t get along well with the other boys in his class.
Tom doesn\'t earn enough money to support a woman like Mary.
If Tom finds out that I told you this, he\'ll be very angry.
If there\'s anyone here who disagrees with me, speak up now.
I want to hear the whole story, and don\'t skip any details.
Tom is a bad driver, but he thinks that he\'s a good driver.
Tom is one of the world\'s leading experts on cybersecurity.
I promise you I\'ll stay with you until your father arrives.
Tom dumped Mary\'s body into the hole he had dug previously.
